newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan firm plans Russian oil, gas investment panel.
newsitem.headline: Japan firm plans Russian oil, gas investment panel.

text.p: The semi-governmental Japan National Oil Corp (JNOC) said on Monday that it would hold a seminar in Tokyo from October 7-8 to promote the development of Russia's oil and natural gas reserves.

Officials from Russia's energy ministry, as well as oil and gas development firms will attend the seminar and talk about the country's energy policy and investment and development plans, the JNOC said.
Oil industry officials will also discuss Japan's role in developing Russia's natural resources, the JNOC said.
